name: Cresselia
author: chibi
flavor_text: Those who sleep holding Cresselia’s feather are assured of joyful dreams. It is said to represent the crescent moon.

attacks.name: Lunar Payback
attacks.effect: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon. If you do, switch all damage counters on this Pokémon with those on your opponent’s Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage times the amount of Energy attached to your opponent’s Active Pokémon.
